text: my name is Craig Atkinson I'm the CEO of
jhc technology we're an innovative
technology company so we specialize in
bringing innovative solutions with
best-of-breed technology to government
and business we're a company that began
its life in the cloud so as a solution
provider we've never owned a server we
have always had our infrastructure in
AWS and have always provided solutions
on AWS for our customers it's allowed us
to save money as a small business we can
deliver solutions faster and much more
cost-effectively than if we were a
traditional organization so it's allowed
us as a small business to fight well
above our weight class joining the
government comm getting the government
competency was something that we did at
launch of the competency it was a
natural fit for us based off of what
we've done in the federal space and the
government space and it was really for
us a way to help differentiate what we
do from the other organizations within
the Amazon partner network we saw it as
a way to really define this was a level
of system integrator or service provider
that knew how to deliver within the
government space when we talk to our
customers and explain to them this is
something that AWS has developed to
really just as a as a qualifier for
their organization and it's not
something that is shared across hundreds
of organizations and companies this is a
very small group of people that small
group organizations that have that
competency having a strong partner and
system integrator to help you manage
that to build processes and procedures
on how you manage your infrastructure
how you secure your infrastructure and
then how you develop automation so that
you drive down both the cost of
development and the cost of management
of your environment while at the same
time
driving down the cost of the
infrastructure is is something that as
the customer starts to go through that
process they not has become does it's
not very long before they realize that
that's something that isn't unique those
problems happen for everyone for JT
technology being part of the AWS partner
network has been tremendous value we've
had gotten access to internal technical
documentation training material for our
internal employees as well as training
credits also we receive stimulus funding
for our customers who might have special

that without that funding might
otherwise have not gone after that
specific endeavor so it's been a great
opportunity for us to do that and and a
way for us to continue and formalize
that relationship that's a natural fit
at least from our perspective a natural
fit from as we look for the Best of
